question: Under which Ministry, the National Handloom Development Programme (NHDP) for development of block level clusters across country is implemented?
option2: Ministry for Development of North Eastern Region
option3: Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
explanation: The Government of India, Ministry of Textiles is implementing National Handloom Development Programme (NHDP) for development of Block Level clusters across the country including Andhra Pradesh & Telangana States. The Block Level clusters are sanctioned on the basis of the viable proposals received from States Government.
